title: Clix Capital raises Rs 220 crore equity from existing investors including Apollo Global
description: The company plans to utilise these funds to strengthen its lending capabilities across the MSME, Education, and Healthcare Equipment sectors, enhance its credit profile & significantly invest in new-age AI & ML technologies. “Our investment in Clix Capital has seen significant value creation and we are delighted to have participated in this equity round. We see ample headroom for growth in Clix Capital’s journey as it expands its footprint in India’s growing MSME sector,” said Utsav Baijal, Partner and Head of India Private Equity, Apollo Global Management.
